INTERSHOP IOM 4.3.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision dc35b6b057c76350a40002e25600baedb10602c7)

Table oms.OrderPosStatesDefDO (Enum)

Supported Order position states.
Order positions states representing the current state of processing an order position.
States are for example INITIAL, ANNOUNCED, DISPATCHED.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
description varchar(255)  
name varchar(255)  

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Enum Values 

id description name
0Order position initially stored in the database.INITIAL
500Order position modified manually and ready to process.DO_CHECK
998Order position has to be checked manually.NOT_CHECKED
999Order position canceled after order check.NOT_CHECKED_DO_CANCEL
1000Order position was checked.CHECKED
1501Approval required.ORDER_APPROVAL_REQUIRED

1600Approved.APPROVED
2001Supplier has to be assigned.DO_ANNOUNCE
2095Supplier was assigned to order positions but does not respect the configured tolerances. Assigned suppliers has to be approved manually.CHECK_ANNOUNCED
2098Order position could not be assigned to a supplier. The order has to be canceled manually.NOT_ANNOUNCED
2099Assignment to a supplier failed, i.e., end of life eol of an product -> automated cancellation of order is configured.NOT_ANNOUNCED_DO_CANCEL
2100Supplier was assigned to the order positions.ANNOUNCED

2200Finished optimization of assigned suppliers.OPTIMIZED
2301Check for order approval.DO_CHECK_ORDER_APPROVAL_REQUIRED

2600Finished creation of documents.PREPARED_DOCUMENT

4099Order position is waiting to be submitted to the supplier, i.e., supplier does not support product reservation.WAIT_FOR_TRANSMIT

4200Reservation was submitted to the supplier.RESERVATED
4210Reservation revoked. Waiting for return.RESERVATION_PARTLY_RETURNED

4600Order position will be prepared for dispatch/ pickup.PICKING
5000Order position dispatched.DISPATCHED
5100Order position/ delivery dispatched and partially returned.DISPATCHED_PARTLY_RETURNED
5200Order position/ delivery is ready to pickup.READY_FOR_PICK_UP
5300Order position/ delivery was picked up.PICKED_UP
6000Order position returned.RETURNED
6200Order position canceled before submission.CANCELED
10000Order position/ delivery was stopped because of order merge. Status to wait without status transitions.WAIT_MERGE
20000Order position/ delivery was stopped because of a custom process. Status to wait without status transitions.DO_CUSTOM_PROCESS
